info.title: Oneflow
info.description: Be more effective with truly digital contracts that make work faster, and life easier. Automate your contract management process with Oneflow

post.description: Add attachment or a  PDF document to a contract.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: File to upload. File name should be in file.ext format

parameters.name: upload_as
parameters.description: select type of attachment to upload

get.description: Retrieve a specific contract file by its ID.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: Type of file: * 1 - Contract PDF * 2 - Verification

put.description: Update a data field in the specific contract by its ID.

parameters.name: data_field_id
parameters.description: Custom id (external key) of the data field.

delete.description: Delete a specific contract by its ID.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a contract by its ID.

get.summary: Get the status of a contract
get.description: Retrieve the status of a specific contract by its ID.

post.description: Sends contract to participants for signing.
Create a new contract based on the selected template.

get.description: Retrieve the list of workspaces available for the specified user.
Retrieve the template type by template id.
Use this endpoint to check if the Oneflow API is available.
Get a list of templates for a specified workspace.

workspace_id.description: Select a Workspace for your contract

template_id.description: Select a template to create your contract from

preferred.x-ms-summary: Is Preferred Two Step Authentication Method

required_participant_attributes.x-ms-summary: Required Participant Attributes (Two Step Authentication Method)

has_passed_notice_period_start_time.x-ms-summary: Has notice period start time passed?

sign_state_updated_time.x-ms-summary: Individual participant sign state updated time

value.description: Value to set for the data field.

custom_id.description: Custom id of the data field
Custom id of the data field
